comments: Nice lady, very boring when early in the morning. Gotta watch movies to do reports-can work with someone for this. No acting required. Required to go to school plays. Seems understanding and helpful. Easy A if you\'re willing to watch the school plays and a couple of movies on your own (moulin rouge, death of a salesman, etc)
always keep your notes and watch the stuff she talks about. you have to go to some shows at school. you will need to pay $40 for the semester only on shows. but she\'s so easy!

She is unsure/gets lost and unclear in the point she is trying to make in her lectures. She wastes a good chunk of time trying to adjust the sound tiny videos clip that she shows the class. She does not specify the amount of info expected in her assignments. Overall she is does not have passion in teaching as she is quiet vague in all explanations
She seems very oblivious, doesnt provide definite answers,avoids explicit material, always expects us to spend money attending shows that arent that good
doesn\'t know how to work technology properly. refuses to let you go to a local performance when you live far a way and can\'t afford smc\'s dumb**** performances.
